sentences.en: ‘Can you give me a ride to work tomorrow?’ ‘Sure.’
sentences.cn: “明天我可以搭你的车去上班吗？”“当然可以。”

sentences.en: ‘Can you pick me up later?’ ‘Sure thing.’
sentences.cn: “你过一会儿能来接我吗？”“没问题。”

sentences.en: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.cn: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.en: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.cn: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.en: "I'm sure I don't know." Cook tossed her head.
sentences.cn: “我确信我不知道。”库克一甩头说。

sentences.en: "What's happened to her?" — "I'm sure she won't be long."
sentences.cn: “她怎么回事？”——“我相信她快到了。”

sentences.en: [with clause]be sure that you know what is required.
sentences.cn: 务必弄清楚要求是什么。

sentences.en: [with infinitive]be sure to pop in.
sentences.cn: 一定要来。

sentences.en: A bad result is sure to throw a spanner in the works.
sentences.cn: 糟糕的成绩肯定会坏事的。

sentences.en: Be sure to read about how mozzarella is made, on page 65.
sentences.cn: 务必看看莫泽雷勒干酪是怎么制成的，在第65页。

sentences.en: Be sure to store them carefully as they bruise easily.
sentences.cn: 小心存放，因为它们很容易被碰伤。

sentences.en: Be sure you get your daily quota of calcium.
sentences.cn: 要确保每天的钙摄入量。

sentences.en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentences.cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentences.en: he's very sure of himself.
sentences.cn: 他非常自信。

sentences.en: I can't say for sure what Giles really wanted.
sentences.cn: 我说不准贾尔斯真正想要的是什么。

sentences.en: Make sure he writes it down.
sentences.cn: 让他一定记下来

sentences.en: Make sure that your meal won't be smothered with white sauce.
sentences.cn: 千万不要把自己的饭菜上都涂满白汁沙司。

sentences.en: Make sure the draining board, sink and plug hole are regularly disinfected.
sentences.cn: 滴水板、水槽和塞孔一定要定期消毒。

sentences.en: Make sure you join the queue inside the bank.
sentences.cn: 在银行里一定要排队。

sentences.en: Make sure your pet won't pine while you're away.
sentences.cn: 要确保不在家时宠物不会想你。

sentences.en: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.cn: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

sentences.en: One thing I am sure of was that she was scared.
sentences.cn: 有一点我能肯定，那就是她当时被吓到了。

sentences.en: She was somewhat unapproachable but I'm sure she wanted to be friendly.
sentences.cn: 她有些不好接近，但我确信她想表现得友好一些。

sentences.en: Sound him out gradually. Make sure it is what he really wants.
sentences.cn: 要慢慢地打探他的口风，要确保是他的心里话。

sentences.en: This proposal is by no means a sure thing.
sentences.cn: 这个提议绝不会理所当然地获得通过。

sentences.en: We'll win for sure.
sentences.cn: 我们肯定会获胜

sentences.en: when X-rays were taken, sure enough, there was the needle.
sentences.cn: 拍完X光片后，果真有一根针。

words.tran_cn: 当然；无疑；坚定地；稳当地

phrases.tran_cn: 千真万确地；和…一样肯定无疑
一定要；务必（用于强调邀请或指示）

trans.tran_cn: 肯定的，有把握的，一定的，无疑的，可靠的，沉着自信的
trans.tran_en: confident that you know something or that something is true or correct

trans.tran_cn: （表示同意）当然，（加强语气）确实，（回答他人的感谢）不客气
